text: @BarbraStreisand In my President Hillary Clinton fantasy, we still had scientists in Wuhan (Trump administration ended this), we would have identified the outbreak early, we would have worked with the Chinese to contain it and COVID-19 would have been a 15 second blip on the news. Sigh.
